author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds new packages to test the implementation and usage of CUDA libraries for device code in CMSSW plugins and executables.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestDevice` implements a library that defines and exports CUDA device-only functions, and a plugin and test that use them.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestKernel` implements a library that imports device functions from `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestDevice` to define and export CUDA kernels, and a plugin and test that use them.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestWrapper` implements a library that imports kernels from `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestKernel` to define and export host-only wrappers around them, usable by non-CUDA libraries, plugins and applications, and implements a plugin and test that use them.


#### PR validation:

The new unit tests compile and pass.
title: Add a test for CUDA library build rules
